alert.note: Alert for Ingham (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 8:28AM EST until January 31 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Michigan... Sycamore Creek At Holt affecting Ingham County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Red Cedar River At East Lansing affecting Ingham County. Grand River at Portland affecting Ionia County. .Moderate to heavy rainfall has fallen on a primed snowpack and that water is now reaching the rivers, resulting in river rises. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red Cedar River at East Lansing. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Expect minor flooding of the Michigan State University athletic fields. The Potter Park Zoo parking lot in Lansing begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM EST Saturday the stage was 6.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 6.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 7.6 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.6 feet on 12/29/1942. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Red Cedar River East Lansing 7.0 6.8 Sat 7 am EST 7.5 7.6 7.3 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/grr. Sunday morning at 1030 AM EST.
